study.title: Our Berkeley Data Digest
study.description:
Public-facing data narratives and dashboards that tell UC Berkeley's story 
 Built with Tableau, d3.js

study.title: Analyzing Course-Taking Patterns with t-SNE
study.description:
A visual tool for exploring UC Berkeley students' course-taking patterns as learned from the t-SNE machine learning algorithm. 
 Built with d3.js

study.title: Campus Revenue Distribution Model
study.description:
A model to distribute annual student tuition & fee revenue to academic units in support of campus finance reform
 Built with mySQL, d3.js, crossfilter.js

study.title: Co-Occurrence of Student Double & Triple Majors
study.description:
An interactive graphic for exploring the combinations of major programs that appear in undergraduate double and triple majors. 
 Built with d3.js

study.title: Migratory Patterns of California Bears
study.description:
An interactive graphic highlighting pathways to degrees taken by undegraduates who entered UC Berkeley in the past 10 years. 
 Built with d3.js

study.title: California Memorial Football Stadium Financing Model
study.description:
An interactive illustration of the Cal Memorial Football Stadium retrofit project's financing model 
 Presented to the UC Regents at the November 2014 Regents meeting 
 Built with d3.js

study.title: Strategic Dilemmas
study.description:
An interactive strategy development exercise that was presented to the UC Berkeley Chancellor's Cabinet in Fall 2013
 Built with d3.js

study.title: University of California Revenue and Expense Trends, FY 2008-2012
study.description:
An interactive version of a report called University of California Revenue and Expense Trends Fiscal Years 2008-2012 
 (which was prepared by the UC Office of the President (UCOP))
 Built with d3.js, crossfilter.js, dc.js and bootstrap

study.title: UC Berkeley Campus Budget Flows 2012-2014
study.description:
A graphic designed to:
 - Faciltate budgetary discussions among campus leaders
 - Promote a shared understanding of the campus' financial challenges 
Built with d3.js

study.title: UC Berkeley Campus Scorecard Prototype
study.description:
A tool for communicating with external campus stakeholders, highlighting Berkeley's commitment to transparency/accountability 
 Monitoring performance with respect to resource alignment, activities towards the campus' strategic goals, resulting outcomes 
 Built with d3.js

study.title: Work Practice Apprentice
study.description:
Participated in a 3-month Work Practice Apprentice program
 Formal Zen meditation training, community service and farm work

study.title: Peace Corps Volunteer
study.description:
Directed a Ford-Foundation baseline study documenting small scale-apiculture in the Dominican Republic 
 Trained secondary-school teachers in conservation/sustainability principles for UNESCO Pilot Project

experience.title: Senior Analyst, Data Visualization :: Office of Planning & Analysis
experience.description:
Collect and analyze data, create visualizations tailored for campus leadership to support decision-making 
 Build data visualization tools used by fellow campus analysts and researchers 
 Build and maintain the campus undergraduate enrollment model, set targets, generate forecasts, track student progress 
 Lead supervised research of undergraduates participating in the Berkeley Data Science Discovery Program

experience.title: Senior Analyst :: Strategic Management & Metrics Project (Operational Excellence)
experience.description:
Support for pilot units on their paths to an effective strategic management process 
 Creation of compelling interactive data visualizations that facilitate cross-campus collaboration and decision-making 
 Development of accessible, interactive graphics that enhance senior leadership's communications with external stakeholders

experience.title: Project Lead :: Student Consolidated Financial View Project (Operational Excellence)
experience.description: User-centered design, data analysis, data visualization and user-interface prototyping to provide Berkeley students with a better online view of their finances

experience.title: Senior Technical Business Analyst :: Student Systems Roadmap Project (Operational Excellence)
experience.description:
Development of assets supporting the business case to replace the campus' homegrown Student Information System: 
 -  A logical architecture model of 93 student applications and their interfaces
 - A total cost of ownership analysis of student information applications 
 Special projects work on behalf of the Berkeley Office of the Registrar and Academic Senate:
 - conducted a review of campus degree audit system and performed vendor fit-gap analysis for campus advising toolkit solution

experience.title: UX/Data Analyst & API Designer :: Kuali Student Software Project
experience.description:
Collaborated with software architects to define service entities and the data that is exchanged across their interfaces 
 Lead analyst on the design and implementation of the campus course approval system (using a release of Kuali Student software)

experience.title: IT Manager | Senior Business Analyst | Database Programmer
experience.description:
Re-engineered the business application architecture to better serve internal customers 
 Procurement and integration of enterprise loan management systems 
 Managed a team of network administrators and software developers

experience.title: Design Analyst
experience.description:
Lead business analyst on wireless billing system, debut of number portability 
 Lead designer of self-service customer web-bill 
 Information modelling and design of new products and fee structures

experience.title: Interaction Designer
experience.description:
Designed a visual Java integrated development environment (IDE) for analysts as part of a suite of rapid app development tools 
 Worked on forward-thinking dashboard design concepts for automotive industry manufacturers

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description:
Java developer of software for tracking sales agent activity for FedEx Corp
 Lead developer of a conference/event planning system for the Hartford Financial Services Corporation 
 Developed web design fundamentals course materials, maintained corporate intranet
